survey_name: Home Automation Device User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on the satisfaction and usability of various home automation devices to improve product offerings and customer experience.

questions.question_text: Which of the following home automation devices do you currently own or use?
questions.client_notes: This is a multi-choice question. Ensure the options cover the most common home automation devices.

script.question_text: Which of the following home automation devices do you currently own or use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the performance of your smart thermostat?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Smart Thermostat' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the performance of your smart thermostat?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Smart Thermostat' in Q1
